description: This is an amended request for information regarding input on artificial intelligence AI supply arrangements.
full_summary:
### Government of Canada Artificial Intelligence (AI) Supply Arrangements: Request for Information

#### Tender Details

* **Reference Number**: WS4350481932-Doc4355927837
* **Amendment Number**: 3
* **Solicitation Number**: WS4350481932
* **Publication Date**: 2023-12-19
* **Tender Closing Date**: 2024-02-09T14:00:00 (Extended to 14:00 HAE on February 9th, 2024)
* **Amendment Date**: 2024-01-17
* **Trade Agreements**: The contract is subject to the following trade agreements: Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement, Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement, Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement, Canadian Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement, World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement, Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, North American Free Trade Agreement, Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership, Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement, Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* **Procurement Category**: SRV (Services)
* **Notice Type**: Request for Information
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open Bidding
* **Regions of Delivery**: Canada
* **Contracting Entity**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **End User Entity**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)

#### Contact Information

* **Name**: Ferguson, Daniel (SPAC/PSPC)
* **Email**: daniel.ferguson@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
* **Phone**: Not Provided

#### Tender Description

This solicitation is for a Request for Information (RFI) Regarding Input on Government of Canada Artificial Intelligence (AI) Supply Arrangements. Bidders are requested to submit information on their capabilities to provide AI solutions to the Government of Canada. The RFI solicitation is open to all qualified suppliers. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted on February 9th, 2024, by 14:00 HAE. All bids submitted after 14:00 HAE will be declared non-responsive.


*  **Unspsc**: 43230000 - Software, 81112200 - Software maintenance and support, 81162000 - Cloud-based software as a service

You are welcome
